trans-unit.source: Payment Reconciliation With the Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds Extension | Microsoft Docs

seg-source.mrk: Payment Reconciliation With the Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds Extension | Microsoft Docs

target.mrk: Odsouhlasení platby pomoci rozšíření Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds | Microsoft Docs

trans-unit.source: Describes the Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds extension, which links to bank accounts so you can and quickly reconcile payments.

seg-source.mrk: Describes the Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds extension, which links to bank accounts so you can and quickly reconcile payments.

target.mrk: Popisuje rozšíření Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds, které odkazuje na bankovní účty, takže můžete a rychle odsouhlasit platby.

trans-unit.source: The Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds Extension

seg-source.mrk: The Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds Extension

trans-unit.source: To quickly reconcile payments made to your bank accounts, the Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds service allows you to link your system bank account to your online bank account.

seg-source.mrk: To quickly reconcile payments made to your bank accounts, the Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds service allows you to link your system bank account to your online bank account.

target.mrk: Pro rychlé odsouhlasení plateb provedených na vaše bankovní účty vám služba Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds umožňuje propojit váš systémový bankovní účet s vaším online bankovním účtem.

trans-unit.source: This means that the latest bank statement is automatically or manually fed into your reconciliation journal, ensuring that you are always processing the latest payments with minimal risk of errors.

seg-source.mrk: This means that the latest bank statement is automatically or manually fed into your reconciliation journal, ensuring that you are always processing the latest payments with minimal risk of errors.

target.mrk: To znamená, že nejnovější bankovní výpis je automaticky nebo ručně vložen do vašeho deníku odsouhlasení, což zajišťuje, že vždy zpracováváte nejnovější platby s minimálním rizikem chyb.

trans-unit.source: The Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds service provides the following benefits:

seg-source.mrk: The Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds service provides the following benefits:

target.mrk: Služba Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds poskytuje následující výhody:

trans-unit.source: Removes the need for manual entry.

seg-source.mrk: Removes the need for manual entry.

trans-unit.source: Improves efficiency and accuracy when doing payment reconciliation.

seg-source.mrk: Improves efficiency and accuracy when doing payment reconciliation.

target.mrk: Zvyšuje efektivitu a přesnost při provádění odsouhlasení platby.

trans-unit.source: Supports a large number of banks.

seg-source.mrk: Supports a large number of banks.

trans-unit.source: Allows up-to-date information about bank transactions from within [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

seg-source.mrk: Allows up-to-date information about bank transactions from within [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

target.mrk: Umožňuje aktuální informace o bankovních transakcích zevnitř [!INCLUDE [d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Supports manual as well as automatic bank feeds.

seg-source.mrk: Supports manual as well as automatic bank feeds.

target.mrk: Podporuje ruční i automatické bankovní informační kanály.

trans-unit.source: Enables outsourcing of payment reconciliation to an accountant by providing access to bank statements.

seg-source.mrk: Enables outsourcing of payment reconciliation to an accountant by providing access to bank statements.

target.mrk: Umožňuje outsourcing schvalování platby účetnímu poskytnutím přístupu k bankovním výpisům.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Set Up the Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds Service](bank-how-setup-bank-statement-service.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Set Up the Envestnet Yodlee Bank Feeds Service](bank-how-setup-bank-statement-service.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací běžte na [Nastavení Envestnet yodlee Bank služby](bank-how-setup-bank-statement-service.md).

seg-source.mrk: Applying Payments Automatically and Reconciling Bank Accounts

target.mrk: Automatické aplikování plateb a odsouhlasení bankovních účtů
